code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 30 YO male presents with Blood for more than 3 weeks. o:Height 70 in, Weight 127 lbs, Temperature 99.3 F, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17 a:Lymphedema p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Albendazole - 400 mg po once, and ordered Lymphoscintigraphy.

s:a 31 YO white m forester presents with Blood for past 11 days. o:Height 70 in, Weight 126 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Lymphedema p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ammonium lactate lotion (5%) - 0.5 g BID, and ordered Lymphoscintigraphy.
